title: Premier League buildup, Lionesses v Brazil and more – matchday live
summary: Dominic Booth will lead discussions and provide news and previews as we gear up for an exciting day of events. Stay tuned for insights and highlights. Don't miss out on the action ahead!

title: Australia v India: third men’s one-day international – live
summary: James Wallace provides live updates in an over-by-over report, delivering real-time insights and commentary. Fans can follow along for detailed coverage of the game. Stay tuned for regular highlights and key moments as they unfold.

title: Labour’s new deputy leader to be announced – UK politics live
summary: Polling indicates that Lucy Powell had a significant lead over Bridget Phillipson as the voting period concluded on Thursday. The results reflect a strong preference for Powell among voters. Further details will be available once the final results are announced.

title: Australia hold off brave Japan to get one over Eddie Jones
summary: The Wallabies secured a win in challenging wet conditions as they kicked off their spring tour. The team's resilience was tested in a tough match, but they managed to maintain their lead to achieve victory. This win sets a positive tone for the upcoming games on their tour.

title: The Blue Jays flipped the World Series script on baseball’s biggest spenders
summary: Toronto's underdog baseball team delivered a surprising victory against the wealthiest team in the league. Their powerful batting showcased that talent and teamwork can triumph over financial advantage. This game served as a testament to the unpredictability of sports.
